attributes.action: allow to have saftey barriers outside school exit for the youngest
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
supporting us in our efforts to have safety barriers by the exit used by the youngest pupils as they leave well lane primary school,
we consider this to be a health and safety issue as t would be very easy for a child to run out of school and directly into the road, erecting a barrier would bee the most cost effective way os ensuring that an accident does not occur.
this petition will be sent to our local councillor

rejection.details: As a specific case, this is a metter for your local authority
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
